casebody.data:
Justice R. ALLAH, Appellant-Movant,
v.
NEW JERSEY DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent. M-792 September Term 2018
M-793 September Term 2018
M-794 September Term 2018
081617 Supreme Court of New Jersey. APRIL 4, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a motion for reconsideration as within time (M-792) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order dismissing the petition for certification (M-793) is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for stay (M-794) is dismissed as moot.
